<!doctype html>
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" prefix="og: http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/ fb: http://www.facebook.com/2010/fbml d: http://dictionary.com/2011/dml">
 <head> 
  <meta http-equiv="Content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"> 
  <base href="http://www.dictionary.com/"> 
  <title>Difference | Define Difference at Dictionary.com</title> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var cookiesManager = function (){
        'use strict';

        var persistentValues = [];

        return {
            getCookieValue : function(name) {
                var value = null,
                    cookies = document.cookie,
                    searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");

                // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie
                if (searchedCookie === -1) {
                    var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");
                    searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie == 0 ? 0 : -1;
                }

                if (searchedCookie > -1) {
                    var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,
                        endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);

                    if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {
                        endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;
                    }

                    value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);
                }

                return value;
            },

            setCookie: function(name, value, hours, domain) {
                var expires = '',
                    domain  = domain || UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain();

                if(hours !== undefined) {
                    var now     = new Date(),
                        time    = now.getTime();

                    time += (3600 * hours) * 1000;
                    now.setTime(time);

                    expires = ';expires=' + now.toGMTString();
                }

                document.cookie =
                    name + '=' + value +
                        expires +
                        ';path=/' +
                        ';domain=' + domain;
            },

            /*
            * This method ensures, that everywhere on the page value of cookie will be the same.
            * It's important in case of cookie, which value can change across the page.
            */
            getPersistentCookieValue: function(name) {
                if (typeof persistentValues[name] === 'undefined') {
                    persistentValues[name] = this.getCookieValue(name);
                    // after reading value, cookie has to be removed
                    this.setCookie(name, null, -1);
                }

                return persistentValues[name];
            }
        }
    }();
</script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    /*jslint browser: true */

    var UrlHelper = function() {
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS     = '.thesaurus.com';
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY    = '.dictionary.com';
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE     = '.reference.com';

        var domain = null;
        var currentURL = null;
        var spanidsUrl = null;

        function getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, currentDomain) {
            var url     = 'http://';
            var source  = '';

            if(currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) {
                url += 'spanids.reference.com/?';
                source = 'd';
            } else if (currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE){
                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';
                source = 'r';
            } else {
                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';
                source = 't';
            }

            url += 'bid=' + bid + '&asid=' + sid + '&bidnew=1&asidnew=1&source=' + source + '&site=app';


            return url;
        }

        function getCurrentDomain() {
            var host = window.location.host;
            var value = "";
            if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS) > -1) {
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS;
            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) > -1) {
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY;
            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE) > -1){
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE;
            }

            return value;
        }

        return {
            getCurrentDomain : function() {
                if(domain === null) {
                    domain = getCurrentDomain();
                }
                return domain;
            },

            getCurrentDomainFromRequest : function() {
                return window.location.host;
            },

            getCurrentUrl : function() {
                if(currentURL === null) {
                    currentURL = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "" + window.location.pathname;
                }
                return currentURL;
            },

            getSpanidsUrl : function(bid, sid, domain) {
                if(spanidsUrl === null) {
                    spanidsUrl = getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, domain);
                }

                return spanidsUrl;
            }
        }
    }();
</script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var BidSidGenerator = (function () {
        'use strict';
        var COOKIE_NAME_BID = 'bid',
            COOKIE_NAME_SID = 'sid',
            COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS = 'spanids',
            COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES = 17520, //two years
            COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES = 0.5, //half an hour
            bidCookieValue = null,
            sidCookieValue = null,
            bidCookieCreated = false,
            sidCookieCreated = false,
            spanIdsCookiePresent = false;

        // generates value of bid/sid cookie
        function generateCookieValue() {
            var max = 999999,
                min = 100000,
                rand = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min,
                time = new Date().getTime();

            return rand + "-" + time;
        }

        // sets value of spanIdsCookiePresent attribute to true and delete spanids cookie,
        // if cookie exist and have appropriate value
        function processSpanIdsCookie() {
            var spanIdsValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS);

            if(spanIdsValue === '1') {
                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS, 0, -1); //removes spanids cookie
                spanIdsCookiePresent = true;
            }

            return false;
        }

        return {
            init: function () {
                bidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_BID);
                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);

                if (bidCookieValue == null || bidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    bidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_BID, bidCookieValue, COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES);
                    bidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    sidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                processSpanIdsCookie();
                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);
            },
            propagateCookies: function() {
                if (bidCookieCreated || sidCookieCreated || spanIdsCookiePresent) {
                    var url = UrlHelper.getSpanidsUrl(bidCookieValue, sidCookieValue, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain()),
                        iFrame = '<iframe id="spanids" style="width:1px;height:1px;margin-left:-1;position:absolute;border:none;" src="' + url + '"></iframe>';
                    document.write(iFrame);
                }
            },
            touchSidCookie: function () {
                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);
                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    sidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);
            },
            isSidCookieCreated: function () {
                return sidCookieCreated;
            },
            isSpanIdsCookiePresent: function () {
                return spanIdsCookiePresent;
            }
        };
    }());

    BidSidGenerator.init();
    BidSidGenerator.propagateCookies();
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    /*
    This partial is used only on DCOM SERP. It's responsible for read "searchOrgQuery" cookie, which is set during redirection
    for Index Divorce project and only then. After read this cookie, cookie is deleted, but value is still accessible via SOQR api.
     */
    var DARCI = DARCI || {};

    DARCI.OQR = (function(){
        'use strict';

        var COOKIE_NAME = 'OriginalQuery',
            value = -1;

        function setValue() {
            value = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME);

            if (value !== null) {
                value = decodeURIComponent(value);
            }
        }

        function deleteCookie() {
            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME, null, -1);
        }

        function init() {
            setValue();
            deleteCookie();
        }

        return {
            getValue: function() {
                if (value === -1) {
                    init();
                }

                return value;
            }
        }
    })();
</script>
  <script>
    var DARCI = DARCI || {},
        u = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=ps&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf_qr=%25%25REFQUERY%25%25&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop",
        s = location.search.match(new RegExp('[\?\&]s=([^\&]*)(\&?)', 'i')),
        ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms,

        /**
         * Because this file is added only in case when CSL is enabled,
         * we can be sure cookieManager will be available.
         */
        refQuery = cookiesManager.getPersistentCookieValue('ReferrerQuery'),
        query, orgQuery;

    DARCI.SearchBoxClickLinkId = '59wn52';

            orgQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
        query =  orgQuery !== null ? orgQuery : "difference";

        u = u.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);
    

    if (s != null && s[1]) {
        if (s[1] == 't' || s[1] == 'ts' || s[1] == 'tn') {
            var ev = u.indexOf('ev=');
            if (ev !== -1) {
                ev = ev + 3;
                u = u.slice(0, ev) + 'c' + u.slice(ev) + '&cl=59wn52&sc=1';
                u = u.replace('%25%25REFQUERY%25%25', refQuery);
            }
        }
    }

    new Image().src = u + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);
</script>

  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//partner.googleadservices.com">

  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//pr.ybp.yahoo.com">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ads.yahoo.com">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//u.openx.net">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ib.adnxs.com">
  <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="//ox-d.bstk.servedbyopenx.com">

  <script>
    /**
     * The module is responsible for setting/incrementing the value of sc cookie which contains "sessionCount,pageviewCount" values.
     *
     * init: sets the cookie with default values or increments; actions performed are based on condition whether the
     *          sid cookie was created or already existed. The default expiration time for sc cookie is 0.5 year
     *
     * global BidSidGenerator
     * global cookiesManager
     * global UrlHelper
     */
    var SCCookie = function () {
        var COOKIE_NAME_SC = "sc",
            DELIMITER = ",",
            sessionCountValue = 0,
            pageviewCountValue  = 0,
            cookieExpiration  = 180 * 24; // half a year

        /**
         * Reads "sc" cookie and parses the value into appropriate variables.
         * @returns {boolean} Was the cookie present?
         */
        function readCookie()
        {
            var cookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SC),
                cookieValuesArray,
                cookieSessionCountValue,
                cookiePageviewCountValue;

            if (cookieValue == null) {
                return false;
            }

            cookieValuesArray = cookieValue.split(DELIMITER);
            cookieSessionCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[0], 10);
            cookiePageviewCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[1], 10);

            if (cookieSessionCountValue > 0) {
                sessionCountValue = cookieSessionCountValue;
            }

            if (cookiePageviewCountValue > 0) {
                pageviewCountValue = cookiePageviewCountValue;
            }

            return true;
        }

        /**
         * Writes current variable values into the "sc" cookie.
         */
        function writeCookie()
        {
            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SC, sessionCountValue + DELIMITER + pageviewCountValue, cookieExpiration, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomainFromRequest());
        }

        return {
            init: function () {
                if (typeof BidSidGenerator !== 'undefined') {
                    var cookiePresent = readCookie();

                    if (!cookiePresent) {
                        sessionCountValue = 1;
                        pageviewCountValue = 1;
                    } else {
                        if (BidSidGenerator.isSidCookieCreated() || BidSidGenerator.isSpanIdsCookiePresent()) {
                            pageviewCountValue = 1;
                            sessionCountValue++;
                        } else {
                            pageviewCountValue++;
                        }
                    }

                    writeCookie();
                }
            },

            getPageViewCount: function () {
                return pageviewCountValue;
            },

            getSessionCount: function () {
                return sessionCountValue;
            }
        }

    }();

    SCCookie.init();
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var src = null;
                        var retina = window.devicePixelRatio > 1;
            if(retina) {
                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-highdpi-3146e.png';
            } else {
                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-lowdpi-6c95e.png';
            }
            </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    var searchURL = "http://www.dictionary.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40?s=t";var pageName = "dic";</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var UserController = function() {
        var USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN = 'L';
        var USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED = 'N';

        var USER_UNDER_13 = 'Y';
        var USER_OVER_13 = 'N';

        var COOKIE_NAME_SESS = 'sess';
        var COOKIE_NAME_FAV = 'fav';
        var COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS = 'ss';

        var PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE = 9;
        var FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY = 0;
        var FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY = 1;
        var FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY = 2;

        var isLoggedIn = null;
        var isPremium = null;
        var isSuperSess = null;
        var favNumber = null;
        var isUnder13 = null;
        var displayAds = null;

        /**
         * Checking if user is under 13 using value from fav cookie
         * @returns {boolean}
         */
        function checkIsUserUnder13() {
            if (isLoggedIn !== true) {
                return false;
            }

            var isUnder13 = USER_OVER_13;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                isUnder13 = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY];
            }

            return isUnder13 === USER_UNDER_13;
        }

        function checkIsUserLoggedIn() {
            var userStatus = USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED;
            var sessCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SESS);

            if(sessCookieValue != null) {
                userStatus = sessCookieValue.charAt(0);
            }

            return userStatus === USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN;
        }

        function checkIfUserIsPremium() {
            var premiumStatus = null;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                premiumStatus = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY];
            }

            return premiumStatus == PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE;
        }

        function getFavNum() {
            var count = 0;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                count = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY];
            }

            return count;
        }


        /**
         * Checking super session cookie and calling ajax endpoint if cookie exists
         * @returns {boolean}
         */
        function checkIfUserHasSuperSession() {
            // get ss cookie value
            var superSessionCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS);

            // if there is ss cookie then make ajax (cors) call to check ss cookie and get response on callback
            if(superSessionCookieValue !== null){

                var xhr = createCORSRequest('GET', 'http://app.dictionary.com/supersession/check/' + superSessionCookieValue);

                if (xhr){
                    // Define a callback function
                    xhr.onload = function(){
                        var responseData = xhr.responseText;
                        var data = JSON.parse(responseData);
                        // process the response.

                        // if response is null then do nothing
                        if(data == null) {
                            // do nothing
                        } else {
                            // otherwise set the session cookie
                            cookiesManager.setCookie("sess", data['sessionCookie']);

                            // change header appropriately
                            changeBodyClassNameForUser();
                        }
                    };

                    // Send request
                    xhr.send();
                }

                return true;
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        }

        /**
         * A method to create cors request
         * @param method
         * @param url
         * @returns {XMLHttpRequest}
         */
        function createCORSRequest(method, url) {
            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
            if ("withCredentials" in xhr) {

                // Check if the XMLHttpRequest object has a "withCredentials" property.
                // "withCredentials" only exists on XMLHTTPRequest2 objects.
                xhr.open(method, url, true);

            } else if (typeof XDomainRequest != "undefined") {

                // Otherwise, check if XDomainRequest.
                // XDomainRequest only exists in IE, and is IE's way of making CORS requests.
                xhr = new XDomainRequest();
                xhr.open(method, url);

            } else {

                // Otherwise, CORS is not supported by the browser.
                xhr = null;

            }

            return xhr;
        }

        /**
         * Checking user status and setting correct body className for user
         */
        function changeBodyClassNameForUser() {
            if(isPremium)
                document.body.className+=' premium';
            if(isLoggedIn)
                document.body.className+=' loggedin';
            if(isUnder13)
                document.body.className+=' isUnder13';
        }

        return {

            initHead: function() {
                isLoggedIn = checkIsUserLoggedIn();
                isPremium = checkIfUserIsPremium();
                isUnder13 = checkIsUserUnder13();
            },

            initBody: function(){
                // on initialization check user status and change append body class name accordingly
                changeBodyClassNameForUser();

                // if the user is not logged in then check to see if the user has an ss cookie
                if(isLoggedIn !== true) {
                    // call function responsible for checking ss cookie and calling ajax endpoint
                    isSuperSess = checkIfUserHasSuperSession();
                }
            },

            isLoggedIn : function() {
                return isLoggedIn;
            },

            isPremium : function() {
                return isPremium
            },

            getFavNumber : function() {
                if(favNumber === null) {
                    favNumber = getFavNum();
                }
                return favNumber;
            },

            isUnder13 : function() {
                return isUnder13;
            },

            shouldDisplayAds: function() {
                if(displayAds === null) {
                    displayAds = !isPremium && !checkIsUserUnder13();
                }
                return displayAds;
            }
        }


    }();
    UserController.initHead();
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var _sp_=function(n){function t(e){if(o[e])return o[e].exports;var r=o[e]={i:e,l:!1,exports:{}};return n[e].call(r.exports,r,r.exports,t),r.l=!0,r.exports}var o={};return t.m=n,t.c=o,t.i=function(n){return n},t.d=function(n,o,e){t.o(n,o)||Object.defineProperty(n,o,{configurable:!1,enumerable:!0,get:e})},t.n=function(n){var o=n&&n.__esModule?function(){return n["default"]}:function(){return n};return t.d(o,"a",o),o},t.o=function(n,t){return Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(n,t)},t.p="",t(t.s=2)}([function(n,t,o){function e(n,t){r&&console[n].apply(console,["[bootstrap]"].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(t)))}var r=(o(0),!1);n.exports={debug:function(){e("debug",arguments)},info:function(){e("info",arguments)},time:function(){e("time",arguments)},warn:function(){e("warn",arguments)},error:function(){e("error",arguments)},useDefaults:function(){r=!0},DEBUG:1}},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(){D||(D=!0,z=h.config=h.config||{},s(),N=z.bootstrap&&z.bootstrap.contentControlCallback||z.content_control_callback,B=z.accountId||z.account_id||z.client_id||window.sp_cid,G=z.beacon&&z.beacon.contentControlEndpoint||z.content_control_beacon_endpoint||v.a,z.debug_level&&"OFF"!==z.debug_level.toString().toUpperCase()||z.debug&&z.debug.level&&"OFF"!==z.debug.level.toString().toUpperCase()?q=!0:window.location.search&&null!=window.location.search.match(/_sp_debug_level=(?!off|OFF)/)&&(q=!0),q&&m.useDefaults({defaultLevel:m.DEBUG}))}function r(n,t,e){function r(o,e){var r=new Image;r.src="//"+G+"/cct?v="+encodeURIComponent(v.b)+"&ct="+_+"&cid="+encodeURIComponent(B)+"&l="+encodeURIComponent(n.toString())+"&rc="+encodeURIComponent(t)+"&d0="+encodeURIComponent(i)+(o?"&d1="+encodeURIComponent(o):"")+(e?"&d2="+encodeURIComponent(e):""),g.info("sending beacon: "+r.src),a&&a()}var i=arguments.length>3&&void 0!==arguments[3]?arguments[3]:"",c=arguments[4],a=arguments[5];if(c){var u=e.lastIndexOf("."),d=e.lastIndexOf("/"),s=-1===u||d>u?e+".png":e.substring(0,u)+".png",l=new Image;l.addEventListener("load",function(){r("1",s)}),l.addEventListener("error",function(){o.i(f.a)(s,function(n,t,o){r("0",s+"::"+o)})}),l.src=s}else r()}function i(n,t,o,e){var r=arguments.length>4&&void 0!==arguments[4]?arguments[4]:{},c=arguments.length>5&&void 0!==arguments[5]&&arguments[5],a=function(){i(n,t,o,e,r,!0)};n(t,c?o:a,e,r)}function c(n,t,o,e){function r(o,r){t(o,n,r,e.enableImageLoad)}function i(t,r){o(t,n,r,e.enableImageLoad),e.onError&&e.onError(r)}var c=document.createElement("script");c.src=n,c.onload=function(){e.onLoad&&e.onLoad()},c.onerror=function(){function t(n){return o.indexOf(n)>-1}var o=(navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera).toLowerCase();t("mobi")||t("ipad")||t("android")||t("iphone")?i(C):t("exabot")?i(k):t("bingbot")||t("bingpreview")?i(U):t("googlebot")||t("adsbot-google")||t("mediapartners-google")?i(I):t("googleweblight")?i(O):window.location.host===w?i(E):window.location.host.indexOf(b)>-1?i(j):t("msie 10")||t("msie 9")||t("msie 8")?i(S):a(n,r,i)},document.head.appendChild(c),document.querySelector('script[src="'+n+'"]')||-1!==window.location.host.indexOf(b)||(g.info("Script not present"),r(L,n))}function a(n,t,e){o.i(f.a)(n,function(o,r,i,c){(o||r?t:e)(c,n+"::"+i)})}function u(n,t,o,e){if(F)return void d(R+"::"+n,o);r(x,n,t,o,e,function(){if(N){if(q){g.error("bootstrap locking",x,n,t,o,e);debugger}setTimeout(function(){N()},250)}})}function d(n,t,o,e){r(y,n,t,o,e)}function s(){h._networkListenerData||(h._networkListenerData=o.i(p.a)())}function l(n,t){e(),g.info("bootstrap called with",n,t),i(c,n,u,d,t)}Object.defineProperty(t,"__esModule",{value:!0});var f=o(4),p=o(5),v=o(3),g=o(0),m=void 0;m=o(0);var w=["w","e","b","c","a","c","h","e",".","g","o","o","g","l","e","u","s","e","r","c","o","n","t","e","n","t",".","c","o","m"].join(""),b=["o","p","t","i","m","i","z","e","l","y","p","r","e","v","i","e","w",".","c","o","m"].join(""),h=window._sp_||{},_=1,y=0,x=1,L="s",C="m",I="g",E="gw",O="gl",S="i",U="b",k="e",R="n",j="o",D=!1,F=!1,q=!1,z=void 0,N=void 0,B=void 0,G=void 0;window.addEventListener("beforeunload",function(){F=!0}),window._sp_=h,h.setupNetworkListeners=s,h.bootstrap=l,window.spBootstrap=l,t["default"]=h},function(n,t,o){o(0);n.exports=o(1)["default"]},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(n){return n.join("")}o.d(t,"b",function(){return r}),o.d(t,"a",function(){return i});var r=(o(0),"2.0.913"),i=(e(["w","w","w",".","s","u","m","m","e","r","h","a","m","s","t","e","r",".","c","o","m"]),e(["w","w","w",".","r","o","o","s","t","e","r","f","i","r","e","w","o","r","k",".","c","o","m"]));e(["/","/","f","s","m","1","0","1","9",".","g","l","o","b","a","l",".","s","s","l",".","f","a","s","t","l","y",".","n","e","t","/","f","s","m","/","d","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","1","3","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","d","f","p","_","i","n","t","e","r","n","a","l","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","1","3",".","j","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","1","3","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","a","p","i","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","1","3",".","h","t","m","l"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","1","3","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","r","i","d","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","1","3",".","h","t","m","l"])},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(n,t){function o(n){try{return n&&n.timeStamp?n.timeStamp:window.performance.now()}catch(n){return Date.now()}}var e=document.createElement("a");if(e.href=n,"https:"===window.location.protocol&&e.protocol!==window.location.protocol)return void t(!1,!1,e.protocol,u);var d=new XMLHttpRequest;try{d.open("GET",n)}catch(n){return void t(!0,!1,n.toString(),c,d)}var s=void 0,l=void 0;d.onloadstart=function(n){s=o(n)},d.onreadystatechange=function(n){if(4===this.readyState){l=o(n)-s;var e=0===this.status,c="2"===this.status.toString()[0],a=c?i:r;return void t(e,c,this.status+"::"+l,a,d)}};try{d.send()}catch(n){return void t(!0,!1,n.toString(),a,d)}}t.a=e;var r=(o(0),"n"),i="nx",c="xo",a="xs",u="p"},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(){var n=arguments.length>0&&void 0!==arguments[0]?arguments[0]:document,t=[],o=[],e=r.bind(null,t),i=r.bind(null,o);return n.addEventListener("load",e,!0),n.addEventListener("error",i,!0),{load:{events:t,listener:e},error:{events:o,listener:i}}}function r(n,t){if(t.target){var o="string"==typeof t.target.tagName?t.target.tagName.toLowerCase():"",e=t.target.src||"";"iframe"!==o&&n.push({tagName:o,src:e})}}t.a=e;o(0)}]);
//# sourceMappingURL=https://s3.amazonaws.com/d3jlsadfjkuern/2.0.913/Ym9vdHN0cmFwLmpz.map
    (function () {
        
window.DARCI = window.DARCI || {};
window.DARCI.gptLoadedCallback = function () {
window.gptLoaded = true;
resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
};

function resetAndLoadGPTRecovery() {
if (gptLoaded && isBlocking) {
resetGpt();
window._sp_.dfp.loadGPT();
}
}

function resetGpt () {
googletag.cmd.push(function () {
googletag.destroySlots();
});

if(typeof spots_deferred !== 'undefined') {
for(var i in spots_deferred) spots_deferred[i].code = spots_deferred[i].code_sp;
}

window.googletag = {};
window.googletag.cmd = [];
window.googletag.slots = {};

googletag.cmd.push(function () {
googletag.slots["dcom-serp-lb-728x90"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/serp_0_y", [[728,90],[970,90],[970,250]], "dcom-serp-lb-728x90").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "top").setTargeting("pos2", "728x90_1").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-a-top-300x250"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/serp_0_y", [[300,250],[300,600]], "dcom-serp-a-top-300x250").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "top").setTargeting("pos2", "300x250_1").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/serp_0_y", [300,250], "dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "mid").setTargeting("pos2", "300x250_2").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/serp_0_y", [728,90], "dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "bot").setTargeting("pos2", "728x90_2").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-bot-300x250"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/serp_0_y/sticky", [300,250], "dcom-serp-bot-300x250").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "bot").setTargeting("pos2", "300x250_3").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");adStatus.renderedAdsCount = 0;
adStatus.spotsCount = 4;
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', handleSlotRender);
googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
googletag.enableServices();
for(var i = 0; i < adStatus.displayedSpots.length; i++)
    googletag.display(adStatus.displayedSpots[i]);
});
}
        window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
window._sp_.config.account_id = 294;
window._sp_.config.publisher_base = '//spb.dictionary.com/proxy';
window._sp_.config.gpt_auto_load = false;
window._sp_.config.enable_rid = false;
window._sp_.config.content_control_callback = function () {
    window.location.href = "http://www.dictionary.com/why-am-i-seeing-ads";
};
window._sp_.config.enable_vid= false;
window._sp_.config.vid_control_callback = function() {
    console.log("VID Triggered!");
};

document.addEventListener('sp.blocking', function (e) {
isBlocking = true;
resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
});

        window._sp_.bootstrap('http://www.dictionary.com/js/sp.js');

    })();
</script> 
  <script>
            var iacjs = iacjs || {};
            iacjs.a9done = true;
        </script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
var get_request_identifier = (function () { return Math.random().toString(36).substr(2) }()),
    get_modified_page_url = (function () {
        sep = window.location.search.length >= 0 && window.location.href.indexOf("?") !== -1 ? "&" : "?";
        return window.location.href + sep + "rquid=" + get_request_identifier
    })();

var ad_config = {
    pageTargeting: {
        ref: window.document.referrer.search("dictionary.com|thesaurus.com|reference.com") > -1 ? "organic" : "direct",
        lang: window.navigator.userLanguage || window.navigator.language,
        rpv: Math.floor((Math.random() * 100) + 1).toString(),
        dc_ref: encodeURIComponent(get_modified_page_url),
        loc: 'US',
        ld: '0',
        dow: new Date().getDay().toString(),
        page_url: get_modified_page_url,
        rquid: get_request_identifier,
    }
};
ad_config.pageTargeting.tx1 = 'results';
ad_config.pageTargeting.tx2 = 'serp_0_n';
ad_config.pageTargeting.ptype = 'content';
ad_config.pageTargeting.spe = 'n';
ad_config.pageTargeting.pv = typeof SCCookie !== 'undefined' ? SCCookie.getPageViewCount() + '' : '';
ad_config.slots = [{"placement":"dcom-serp-lb-728x90","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"728x90_top","targeting":{"pos":"top","pos2":"728x90_1"},"sizes":[[728,90],[970,90],[970,250]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-a-top-300x250","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"300x250_top","targeting":{"pos":"top","pos2":"300x250_1"},"sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"300x250_mid","targeting":{"pos":"mid","pos2":"300x250_2"},"sizes":[[300,250]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"728x90_bot","targeting":{"pos":"bot","pos2":"728x90_2"},"sizes":[[728,90]]}];
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
var adStatus = {
    spotsCount: 4,
    renderedSpots: [],
    renderedSpotsCount: 0,
    displayedSpots: [],
    set: function(name, size) {
        this.renderedSpots[name] = {
            size: size
        };
    },
    get: function(name) {
        return this.renderedSpots[name];
    },
    getSlotKey: function(slot) {
        var slotKey;
        for (slotKey in googletag.slots) {
            if(googletag.slots[slotKey] == slot) {
                break;
            }
        }
        return slotKey;
    },
    adsLoaded: function() {
        return this.renderedSpotsCount >= this.spotsCount;
    }
};

adStatus.dispatchLoadedEvent = function () {
    if(adStatus.adsLoaded()) {
        if (document.createEvent) {
            var event = new CustomEvent('gptAdsLoaded');
            document.dispatchEvent(event);
        } else {
            var event = document.createEventObject();
            event.eventType = "gptAdsLoaded";
            document.fireEvent("ongptAdsLoaded", event);
        }
    }
};

var handleSlotRender = function(data) {
    var key = adStatus.getSlotKey(data.slot);
    adStatus.set(key, data.size);
    adStatus.renderedSpotsCount += 1;
        adStatus.dispatchLoadedEvent();
    };
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    googletag.slots = googletag.slots || {};
    var iacjs = iacjs || {};
    iacjs.que = iacjs.que || [];
    var gptLoaded = false, isBlocking = false;

    CONTAINER_TIMEOUT = 1500;

    iacjs.asynLoader = function(scriptInfo, callback) {
        var p, tag = document.createElement("script"),
            node = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
        tag.async = true;
        tag.onload = tag.onerror = function() {
            typeof callback === 'function' && callback()
        };
        for (p in scriptInfo) {
            if (scriptInfo.hasOwnProperty(p)) {
                tag[p] = scriptInfo[p];
            }
        }
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, node);
    };

    function initAdServer() {
        if (iacjs.initAdserverSet) return;
        iacjs.asynLoader({
            src: "//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js"
        }, function () {
            if (typeof window.DARCI !== 'undefined' && typeof window.DARCI.gptLoadedCallback === 'function')
                window.DARCI.gptLoadedCallback();
        });
        iacjs.initAdserverSet = true;
    }

    iacjs.asynLoader({
        src: "http://www.iacpublish.com/iacpublisher.min-dictionary.js"
    });

    function bidsBackHandler(type) {
        if (type === 'a9') {
            iacjs.a9done = true;
        }

        if (type === 'ayc')
            iacjs.aycDone = true;

        if (iacjs.a9done && iacjs.aycDone) {
            window.initAdServer();
        }
    }

    iacjs.que.push(function() {
        iacjs.pageTargeting = ad_config.pageTargeting;

                iacjs.addAdUnits(ad_config.slots);
        iacjs.requestBids({
            bidsBackHandler: function() {
                window.bidsBackHandler('ayc');
            }
        });
        
    });

    (function() {
        var slots = ad_config.slots || [];
        var outofpageslots = ad_config.outofpageslots || []; //for virool spots on mweb
        var index, pageTarget;
        var pageTargeting = ad_config.pageTargeting || {};

        iacjs.setSlotTargeting = function (slot, googletag) {
         for (var target in slot.targeting) {
             if (slot.targeting.hasOwnProperty(target)) {
                 googletag.slots[slot.placement].setTargeting(target, slot.targeting[target])
             }
         }
       };

        var defineSlot = function(slot) {
            if (typeof slot === 'object') {
                (function(slot) {
                    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                        googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineSlot(slot.code, slot.sizes, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads());
                        for (target in slot.targeting) {
                            if (slot.targeting.hasOwnProperty(target)) {
                                googletag.slots[slot.placement].setTargeting(target, slot.targeting[target])
                            }
                        }
                        if (typeof(slot.sizeMapping) === 'function') {
                            googletag.slots[slot.placement].defineSizeMapping(slot.sizeMapping(googletag))
                        }
                    })
                })(slot)
            } else {
                log.error('slot not defined', slot)
            }
        };

        var defineOutOfPageSlot = function (slot) {
         if (typeof slot === 'object') {
             (function (slot) {
                 googletag.cmd.push(function () {
                     googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot(slot.code, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads());
                     iacjs.setSlotTargeting(slot, googletag);
                 })
               })(slot);
         }
       };

        var setRefreshPageTargeting = function(page_level_targeting) {
            var pageTargeting = page_level_targeting || {};
            for (pageTarget in pageTargeting) {
                if (pageTargeting.hasOwnProperty(pageTarget)) {
                    (function(key, value) {
                        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                            googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, value)
                        })
                    })(pageTarget, pageTargeting[pageTarget])
                }
            }
        }

        window.defineSlot = defineSlot;
        window.setRefreshPageTargeting = setRefreshPageTargeting;

                for (index = 0; index < slots.length; index++) {
            defineSlot(slots[index]);
        }
        
        
        setRefreshPageTargeting(pageTargeting);

        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
            googletag.enableServices();
        });

                googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            iacjs.que.push(function() {
                iacjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
            });
        });
        
        iacjs.timeout = window.setTimeout(initAdServer, CONTAINER_TIMEOUT);
    })();

    iacjs.createNewSlot = function(slot) {
        if (typeof slot === "object" && typeof slot.placement === "string") {
            adStatus.displayedSpots.push(slot.placement);
            googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                defineSlot(slot);
                if (typeof iacjs.libLoaded !== "undefined") {
                    iacjs.que.push(function() {
                        iacjs.addAdUnits(slot);
                        iacjs.requestBids({
                            adUnitCodes: [slot.placement],
                            bidsBackHandler: function() {
                                iacjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync({
                                    adUnitCodes: [slot.placement]
                                });
                                googletag.display(slot.placement);
                            }
                        });
                    });
                } else {
                    iacjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync({
                        adUnitCodes: [slot.placement]
                    });
                    googletag.display(slot.placement);
                }
            });
        }
    };

    iacjs.refreshAd = function(valid_ad_units, slots) {
        if (typeof iacjs.libLoaded !== "undefined") {
            iacjs.que.push(function() {
                if (valid_ad_units.length > 0) {
                    iacjs.requestBids({
                        timeout: CONTAINER_TIMEOUT,
                        adUnitCodes: valid_ad_units,
                        bidsBackHandler: function() {
                            iacjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync({
                                adUnitCodes: valid_ad_units
                            });
                            googletag.pubads().refresh(slots)
                        }
                    });
                } else {
                    iacjs.requestBids({
                        timeout: CONTAINER_TIMEOUT,
                        bidsBackHandler: function() {
                            iacjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
                            googletag.pubads().refresh()
                        }
                    });
                }
            });
        } else {
            if (valid_ad_units.length > 0) {
                googletag.pubads().refresh(slots)
            } else {
                googletag.pubads().refresh()
            }
        }
    }
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
var spots_deferred = {"dcom-serp-bot-300x250":{"placement":"dcom-serp-bot-300x250","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_n\/sticky","code_sp":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/serp_0_y\/sticky","ad_uuid":"300x250_bot","targeting":{"pos":"bot","pos2":"300x250_3"},"sizes":[[300,250]]}};
</script>
  <script>
    googletag.cmd.push(function () {
                googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
                        googletag.pubads().enableAsyncRendering();
                        googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', handleSlotRender);
        googletag.enableServices();
    });
</script>

        'LDid': '0',

        'sessionId': cookiesManager.getCookieValue("sid"),
        'browserId': cookiesManager.getCookieValue("bid")    });

  <script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  var _qevents = _qevents || [];

  (function() {
   var elem = document.createElement('script');

   elem.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://secure" : "http://edge") + ".quantserve.com/quant.js";
   elem.async = true;
   elem.type = "text/javascript";
   var scpt = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
   scpt.parentNode.insertBefore(elem, scpt);  
  })();
</script>

        s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") + ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";
        el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
    })();
}

  <script>
    (function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
        new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
        j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;
        j.src= '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;
        f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
    })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-TXC5GP');

  <div id="fb-root"></div> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    UserController.initBody();
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
        /**
     * Redirects user to address from parameter
     *
     * @param url
     * @returns {boolean}
     */
    function submitForm(url) {
        var queryText = document.getElementById('q').value || 'search';

        queryText = encodeURIComponent(queryText);

        url = url.replace('%40%40queryText%40%40', queryText);

                location.href = url;
        return false;
    }

    function prepareSearchBox(el) {
        var dataTerm = el.getAttribute('data-term');
        var value = el.value;
        if (!(/(iPad|iPhone|iPod)/g.test(navigator.userAgent))) {
            el.focus();
            if (dataTerm == value) {
                el.select();
            }
        }
    }
</script> 
  <nav class="ham-nav dictionary-nav"> 
   <ul> 
    <li class="ham-main-menu"><a href="http://www.dictionary.com/" data-linkid="lxabec">Dictionary.com</a></li> 
    <li> 
     <ul class="ham-submenu"> 
      <li><a href="http://www.dictionary.com/wordoftheday/" data-linkid="1498ik">Word <i class="wotd-italic">of the</i> Day</a></li> 
      <li><a href="http://translate.reference.com/" data-linkid="au3zd1">Translate</a></li> 
      <li><a href="http://www.dictionary.com/fun" data-linkid="yp2k17">Games</a></li> 
      <li><a href="http://blog.dictionary.com/" data-linkid="t6ehki">Blog</a></li> 
     </ul> </li> 
    <li class="ham-main-menu"><a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/" data-linkid="c1drjk">Thesaurus.com</a></li> 
    <li class="ham-main-menu"> <a href="http://app.dictionary.com/favorites">Favorites <span class="dicticon-header-favourites-star"></span> <span class="ham-favourites-number"></span> </a> </li> 
   </ul> 
  </nav> 
  <button class="dicticon-hamburger-menu slide-element"></button> 
  <header class="js-header dictionary-header"> 
   <div class="header-nav-row"> 
    <ul class="header-main-nav"> 
     <li class="nav-active"> <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/" data-linkid="tqks0v">Dictionary.com</a> </li> 
     <li> <a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/" data-linkid="qxnxzj">Thesaurus.com</a> </li> 
    </ul> 
    <ul class="header-login-nav"> 
     <li class="user-logged-in account"><a href="http://app.dictionary.com/users/settings">My Account</a></li>

   <div class="header-search-row"> 
    <div class="header-wrapper-row"> 
     <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/" data-linkid="yg487x"> <img src="http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/dcom-logo-8f31c.png" alt="Dictionary.com"> </a> 
     <form id="main_search" class="header-search-form" action="http://www.dictionary.com/dic"> 
      <div class="header-search-wrapper"> 
       <div class="search-filter-nav"> 
        <span class="dicticon-filter"></span> 
        <span class="filter-item-active" data-filter-action="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40">definitions</span> 
       </div> 
       <input type="text" value="difference" autoComplete="off" autocapitalize="off" autocorrect="off" name="q" class="search-input transparent-text" id="q" data-term="difference"> 
       <script>
    (function() {
        var searchInput = document.getElementById('q');
        if (searchInput !== null) {
            if (DARCI.OQR.getValue() !== null) {
                searchInput.value = DARCI.OQR.getValue();
                searchInput.select();
            }
            searchInput.className = searchInput.className.replace('transparent-text', '');
        }
    })();
</script> 
       <input type="hidden" name="s" value="t"> 
       <button type="submit" id="search-submit" class="dicticon-search-submit" value=""></button> 
       <ul class="filter-list filter-hidden"> 
        <li class="filter-hidden" data-filter="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40">definitions</li> 
        <li class="" data-filter="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40">synonyms</li> 
        <li class="" data-filter="http://translate.reference.com/?query=%40%40queryText%40%40">translations</li> 
       </ul> 
      </div> 
     </form> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
   <div class="social-follow-module"> 
    <ul class="social-follow-btns"> 
     <li> 
      <div class="fb-like-wrapper"> 
       <div class="fb-like" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/dictionarycom" data-layout="button_count" data-action="like" data-show-faces="true" data-share="false"></div> 
      </div> </li> 
     <li> <a class="twitter-follow-button" href="https://twitter.com/dictionarycom" data-show-screen-name="false">Follow @dictionarycom</a> </li> 
     <li> <span class="ig-follow" data-id="17031a6e93" data-handle="igfbdotcom" data-count="true" data-size="medium" data-username="false"></span> </li> 
     <li> 
      <div class="g-follow" data-annotation="bubble" data-height="20" data-href="https://plus.google.com/117428481782081853923" data-rel="publisher"></div> </li> 
    </ul> 
    <p>follow Dictionary.com</p> 
   </div>
  </header> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var DARCI = DARCI || {};
    DARCI.searchedTerm = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
    DARCI.searchedTerm = DARCI.searchedTerm !== null ? DARCI.searchedTerm : 'difference';

    document.getElementById('main_search').onsubmit = function(e, url) {
        // if url parameter wasn't passed submitFrom() is called with default parameter, which is searchURL
        // searchURL is defined and added as a global js option in controller
        return submitForm(url || searchURL);
    }

    prepareSearchBox(document.getElementById('q'));

    cookiesManager.setCookie('ReferrerQuery', DARCI.searchedTerm);
</script> 
  <div id="header-lb-container"> 
   <div class="lb-container"> 
    <div id="dcom-serp-lb-728x90"> 
     <script type="text/javascript">
        if (typeof UserController !== "undefined" && !UserController.shouldDisplayAds()) {
            document.getElementById("dcom-serp-lb-728x90").parentNode.removeChild(document.getElementById(""));
        } else {
            adStatus.displayedSpots.push("dcom-serp-lb-728x90");
            googletag.cmd.push(function () {
                googletag.display("dcom-serp-lb-728x90");
            });
        }
    </script> 
    </div> 
   </div>

  <div id="fly-out" class="fly-out fly-out-desktop" style=""> 
   <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/slideshows/slang-watch-2017?param=dcomserp" style="display:block;" data-linkid="dbakms">

  <div class="content-container main-area"> 
   <div class="row"> 
    <div class="left-rail-container"> 
     <div class="left-nav-sticky"> 
      <div class="left-nav-wrapper"> 
       <ul> 
        <li class="left-nav-fav"> <button class="favorite-button">Favorite Button</button> </li>

        <li class="left-nav-trans"> <a href="http://translate.reference.com/translate?query=difference" data-linkid="qnmgro">Translate</a> </li>

         <div class="share">
