    <div class="center-well-container" data-linkid="nn1ov4" data-cts="{&quot;linkId&quot;:&quot;nn1ov4&quot;,&quot;infix&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;domain&quot;:&quot;dictionary.com&quot;,&quot;clkpage&quot;:&quot;dic&quot;,&quot;clkmod&quot;:&quot;1clk&quot;,&quot;clksite&quot;:&quot;dict&quot;,&quot;clkld&quot;:0}" data-href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/"> 
     <section id="source-luna" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-luna is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <section class="luna-box"> 
        <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big"> 
         <div class="waypoint-wrapper header-row header-first-row" data-href="source-luna"> 
          <h1 class="head-entry"><span class="me" data-syllable="difference">difference</span></h1> 
          <div class="audio-wrapper cts-disabled"> 
           <audio> 
            <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/lunawav/D02/D0294500.ogg" type="audio/ogg"> 
            <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/D02/D0294500.mp3" type="audio/mpeg"> 
           </audio> 
           <div class="speaker"></div>
          </div> 
          <h3 class="head-entry-variants"></h3> 
         </div> 
         <div class="header-row header-extras pronounce pronset"> 
          <div> 
           <span class="pron spellpron">[<span class="dbox-bold">dif</span>-er-<span class="dbox-italic">uh</span> ns, <span class="dbox-bold">dif</span>-r<span class="dbox-italic">uh</span> ns] </span> 
           <span class="pron ipapron">/?d?f ?r ?ns, ?d?f r?ns/ </span> 
           <span class="pre-def-data"> </span> 
          </div> 
          <div> 
           <button class="prontoggle pronounce-button pronounce-Spell-button">Spell</button> 
           <button class="syllable-button syllable-button-off" data-header="1">Syllables</button> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <div class="header-row"> 
          <ul class="headword-bar-list"> 
           <li> <a data-navigation-href="source-synonyms"> Synonyms </a> </li> 
           <li> <a data-navigation-href="source-example-sentences"> Examples </a> </li> 
           <li> <a data-navigation-href="source-word-origin"> Word Origin </a> </li> 
          </ul> 
         </div> 
        </header> 
        <div class="deep-link-synonyms"> 
         <a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/difference" data-linkid="oowy0r">See more synonyms on Thesaurus.com</a> 
        </div> 
        <div class="source-data"> 
         <div class="def-list"> 
          <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-set&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;def&quot;}"> 
           <header class="luna-data-header"> 
            <span class="dbox-pg">noun</span> 
           </header> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">1.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              the state or relation of being different; dissimilarity: 
             <div class="def-block def-inline-example">
              <span class="dbox-example">There is a great difference between the two.</span>
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">2.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              an instance or point of unlikeness or dissimilarity: 
             <div class="def-block def-inline-example">
              <span class="dbox-example">What accounts for the differences in their behavior?</span>
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">3.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a significant change in or effect on a situation: 
             <div class="def-block def-inline-example">
              <span class="dbox-example">His tact makes a difference in the way people accept his suggestions.</span>
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">4.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a distinguishing characteristic; distinctive quality, feature, etc.: 
             <div class="def-block def-inline-example">
              <span class="dbox-example">The difference in the two products is quality.</span>
             </div> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">5.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              the degree to which one person or thing differs from another. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">6.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              the act of distinguishing; discrimination; distinction. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">7.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a disagreement in opinion. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">8.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a dispute or quarrel. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">9.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              Also called 
             <span class="dbox-bold">finite distance</span>. 
             <span class="dbox-italic">Mathematics.</span> 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li> the amount by which one quantity is greater or less than another. </li> 
              <li> <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/relative-complement">relative complement</a>. </li> 
              <li> (of a function <span class="dbox-italic">f</span>) an expression of the form <span class="dbox-italic">f</span> (<span class="dbox-italic">x</span> + <span class="dbox-italic">h</span>) ? <span class="dbox-italic">f</span> (<span class="dbox-italic">x</span>). </li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">10.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a differentia. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </section> 
          <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-set&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;def&quot;}"> 
           <header class="luna-data-header"> 
            <span class="dbox-pg">verb (used with object)</span>, 
            <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="differenced, ">differenced, </span>
            <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="differencing.">differencing.</span> 
           </header> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">11.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              to cause or constitute a difference in or between; make 
             <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/different">different</a>. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">12.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              to perceive the difference in or between; discriminate. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </section> 
          <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-set&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;def&quot;}"> 
           <header class="luna-data-header"> 
            <span class="dbox-pg">Idioms</span> 
           </header> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">13.</span> 
            <div class="def-content"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">split the difference, </span> 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li> to compromise, especially to make equal concessions. </li> 
              <li> to divide the remainder equally: 
               <div class="def-block def-inline-example">
                <span class="dbox-example">Let's take half of the cake and let the three of them split the difference.</span>
               </div> </li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </section> 
         </div> 
         <div class="tail-wrapper"> 
          <div class="tail-box tail-type-origin pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content"> 
           <div class="tail-header waypoint-wrapper oneClick-disabled" id="source-word-origin">
             Origin of 
            <span class="me" data-syllable="difference">difference</span> 
            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
           </div> 
           <div class="tail-content "> 
            <div class="tail-elements"> 
             <div class="map-origin"> 
              <div class="map-area"> 
               <div class="map-origin-language" style="left: 45.522222222222%;bottom: 68.088888888889%;"> 
                <div class="dot dot-left dot-bottom "></div> 
                <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled"> 
                 <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/middle-english">Middle English</a> 
                </div> 
               </div> 
               <div class="map-origin-language" style="right: 54.2%;top: 32.466666666667%;"> 
                <div class="dot dot-right dot-top "></div> 
                <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled"> 
                 <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/anglo-french">Anglo-French</a> 
                </div> 
               </div> 
               <div class="map-origin-language" style="left: 49.294444444444%;top: 37.561111111111%;"> 
                <div class="dot dot-left dot-top "></div> 
                <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled"> 
                 <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/latin">Latin</a> 
                </div> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="timeline oneClick-disabled"> 
              <div class="span" style="left:49.50495049505% ; width:3.5360678925035% ;"> 
               <span class="date start-date">1300-1350</span> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <span class="dbox-roman">1300-50;</span> 
             <span class="dbox-roman">Middle English</span> (&lt; 
             <span class="dbox-roman">Anglo-French</span>) &lt; 
             <span class="dbox-roman">Latin</span> 
             <span class="dbox-italic">differentia,</span> equivalent to 
             <span class="dbox-italic">different-</span> carrying different ways (see 
             <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/different">different</a>) + 
             <span class="dbox-italic">-ia</span> 
             <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/-ia">-ia</a>; see 
             <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/-ence">-ence</a> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="tail-box tail-type-synonyms pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content"> 
           <div class="tail-header waypoint-wrapper" id="source-synonyms">
             Synonyms 
            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
           </div> 
           <div class="deep-link-synonyms"> 
            <a href="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/difference" data-linkid="oowy0r">See more synonyms on Thesaurus.com</a> 
           </div> 
           <div class="tail-content ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.tail-elements&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;supText&quot;}"> 
            <div class="tail-elements"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">1. </span>inconsistency, variation, diversity, imbalance, inequality, divergence, contrast, contrariety. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="tail-box tail-type-antonyms pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content"> 
           <div class="tail-header ">
             Antonyms 
            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
           </div> 
           <div class="tail-content ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.tail-elements&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;supText&quot;}"> 
            <div class="tail-elements"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">1. </span>similarity, agreement. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="tail-box tail-type-synstudy pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content"> 
           <div class="tail-header ">
             Synonym Study 
            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
           </div> 
           <div class="tail-content ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.tail-elements&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;supText&quot;}"> 
            <div class="tail-elements"> 
             <span class="dbus_ford">1.</span>
             <span class="dbox-sc">Difference,</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">discrepancy,</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">disparity,</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">dissimilarity</span> imply perceivable unlikeness, variation, or diversity. 
             <span class="dbox-sc">Difference</span> refers to a lack of identity or a degree of unlikeness: 
             <span class="dbox-example">a difference of opinion; a difference of six inches.</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">Discrepancy</span> usually refers to an inconsistency between things that should agree, balance, or harmonize: 
             <span class="dbox-example">a discrepancy between the statements of two witnesses.</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">Disparity</span> implies inequality, often where a greater equality might reasonably be expected: 
             <span class="dbox-example">a great disparity between the ages of husband and wife.</span> 
             <span class="dbox-sc">Dissimilarity</span> indicates an essential lack of resemblance between things in some respect comparable: 
             <span class="dbox-example">a dissimilarity between social customs in Asia and America.</span> 
             <span class="dbus_ford">6.</span> See 
             <a class="dbox-xref dbox-roman" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/distinction">distinction</a>. 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </section> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        Dictionary.com Unabridged
       <br>Based on the Random House Dictionary,  Random House, Inc. 2017.
       <br> 
       <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="difference" data-source="luna">Cite This Source</a> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section id="source-example-sentences" class="source-wrapper source-example-sentences is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box"> 
      <div class="source-title">
        Examples from the Web for 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> 
       <button class="js-button-source button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="sent-wrap ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.source-box&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;sentences_list&quot;}"> 
       <div class="source-box oneClick-area" data-cts="{&quot;linkId&quot;:&quot;k4otco&quot;,&quot;infix&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;domain&quot;:&quot;dictionary.com&quot;,&quot;clkpage&quot;:&quot;dic&quot;,&quot;clkmod&quot;:&quot;1clkesp&quot;,&quot;clksite&quot;:&quot;dict&quot;,&quot;clkld&quot;:0}" data-href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/" data-imp="k4otco"> 
        <div class="source-subtitle oneClick-disabled">
         Contemporary Examples
        </div> 
        <ul> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> Again, the <em>difference</em> can seem subtle and sound more like splitting hairs, but the <em>difference</em> is important. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="fboxke"> 
           <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2015/01/08/how-skinny-is-too-skinny-israel-bans-underweight-models.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">How Skinny Is Too Skinny? Israel Bans Underweight Models</a> </span> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/contributors/carrie-arnold.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Carrie Arnold</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> January 7, 2015 </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> One <em>difference</em> was that Chen was herself wearing white gloves. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="fboxke"> 
           <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2015/01/05/an-nypd-family-s-grief-beats-back-grievances-for-most.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Funeral Protest Is Too Much for NYPD Union Boss</a> </span> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/contributors/michael-daly.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Michael Daly</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> January 4, 2015 </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> That is the <em>difference</em> between the protections embedded in our Bill of Rights and the lived lives of our citizenry. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="fboxke"> 
           <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/12/30/what-would-happen-if-i-got-in-white-cop-s-face.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">What Would Happen if I Got in White Cops Face?</a> </span> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/contributors/goldie-taylor.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Goldie Taylor</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> December 29, 2014 </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> But this may be a distinction without much of a <em>difference</em>especially since Scalise admitted speaking before EURO. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="fboxke"> 
           <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/12/30/white-pride-leader-sticks-up-for-scalise.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">GOP Boss Gets Help From White Hate Pal</a> </span> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/contributors/tim-mak.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Tim Mak</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> December 29, 2014 </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> The <em>difference</em> was emphasized immediately after QZ8501 went missing. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="fboxke"> 
           <a class="partner-example-logo" href="http://www.thedailybeast.com?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"></a> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/12/29/the-presumed-crash-of-airasia-flight-qz8501-is-nothing-like-mh370.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">The Presumed Crash of AirAsia Flight QZ8501 Is Nothing Like MH370</a> </span> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.thedailybeast.com/contributors/lennox-samuels.html?source=dictionary" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Lennox Samuels</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> December 28, 2014 </span> 
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> 
       </div> 
       <div class="source-box oneClick-area" data-cts="{&quot;linkId&quot;:&quot;ixxth0&quot;,&quot;infix&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;domain&quot;:&quot;dictionary.com&quot;,&quot;clkpage&quot;:&quot;dic&quot;,&quot;clkmod&quot;:&quot;1clkesp&quot;,&quot;clksite&quot;:&quot;dict&quot;,&quot;clkld&quot;:0}" data-href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/" data-imp="ixxth0"> 
        <div class="source-subtitle oneClick-disabled">
         Historical Examples
        </div> 
        <ul> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> "It makes no <em>difference</em> to you where I got it," said our hero, returning the money to his pocket. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9"> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9990/9990-h/9990-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Brave and Bold</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> Horatio Alger </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> There was one <em>difference</em>, however, between the surprise felt by the two. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9"> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9990/9990-h/9990-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Brave and Bold</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> Horatio Alger </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> The <em>difference</em> too is radical; it goes to the heart of the mystery. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9"> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9996/9996-h/9996-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">'Tis Sixty Years Since</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> Charles Francis Adams </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> But every <em>difference</em> of opinion is not a <em>difference</em> of principle. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9"> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/925/925-h/925-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">United States Presidents' Inaugural Speeches</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> Various </span> 
          </div> </li> 
         <li> <p class="partner-example-text"> Ascribes to the <em>difference</em> in each of their tempers their mutual love. </p> 
          <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9"> 
           <span> <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9296/9296-h/9296-h.htm" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Clarissa, Volume 1 (of 9)</a> </span> 
           <span class="oneClick-disabled"> Samuel Richardson </span> 
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> 
       </div> 
      </div>
     </section>
     <section id="source-ced2" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-ced2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-title">
        British Dictionary definitions for 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> 
       <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big"> 
        <div class="header-row header-first-row"> 
         <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">difference</span></h2> 
        </div> 
        <div class="header-row header-middle-row"> 
         <div class="pronounce"> 
          <span class="pronset"> <span class="pron ipapron">/<span class="dbox-pron">?d?f?r?ns; </span><span class="dbox-pron">?d?fr?ns</span>/ </span> </span> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </header> 
       <div class="source-data ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-coll&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;collins&quot;}"> 
        <div class="def-coll"> 
         <div class="def-list"> 
          <div class="def-pbk"> 
           <span class="dbox-pg">noun</span> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">1.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              the state or quality of being unlike 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">2.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a specific instance of being unlike 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">3.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a distinguishing mark or feature 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">4.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a significant change in a situation: 
             <span class="dbox-ex">the difference in her is amazing</span> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">5.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a disagreement or argument: 
             <span class="dbox-ex">he had a difference with his wife</span> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">6.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              a degree of distinctness, as between two people or things 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">7.</span> 
            <div class="def-content"> 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li>the result of the subtraction of one number, quantity, etc, from another</li> 
              <li>the single number that when added to the subtrahend gives the minuend; remainder</li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">8.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              (
             <span class="dbox-bold">logic</span>) 
             <span class="dbox-italic">another name for </span>
             <a href="/browse/differentia">differentia</a> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">9.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              (
             <span class="dbox-bold">maths</span>, 
             <span class="dbox-bold">of two sets</span>) 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li>the set of members of the first that are not members of the second <span class="dbox-bold">A  B</span></li> 
              <li><span class="dbox-bold">symmetric difference, </span>the set of members of one but not both of the given sets <span class="dbox-italic">Often symbolized </span><span class="dbox-bold">A + B</span></li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">10.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              (
             <span class="dbox-bold">heraldry</span>) an addition to the arms of a family to represent a younger branch 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">11.</span> 
            <div class="def-content"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">make a difference</span> 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li>to have an effect</li> 
              <li>to treat differently</li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">12.</span> 
            <div class="def-content"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">split the difference</span> 
             <ol class="def-sub-list"> 
              <li>to settle a dispute by a compromise</li> 
              <li>to divide a remainder equally</li> 
             </ol> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">13.</span> 
            <div class="def-content"> 
             <span class="dbox-bold">with a difference, </span>with some peculiarly distinguishing quality, good or bad 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="def-pbk"> 
           <span class="dbox-pg">verb </span>(
           <span class="dbox-bold">transitive</span>) 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">14.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              (
             <span class="dbox-bold">rare</span>) to distinguish 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-set"> 
            <span class="def-number">15.</span> 
            <div class="def-content">
              (
             <span class="dbox-bold">heraldry</span>) to add a charge to (arms) to differentiate a branch of a family 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <div class="tail-wrapper"> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        Collins English Dictionary - Complete &amp; Unabridged 2012 Digital Edition
       <br>  William Collins Sons &amp; Co. Ltd. 1979, 1986  HarperCollins
       <br>Publishers 1998, 2000, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2012
       <br> 
       <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="difference" data-source="ced2">Cite This Source</a> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section id="source-etymon2" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-etymon2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-title">
        Word Origin and History for 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> 
       <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <div class="source-data"> 
        <div class="def-list"> 
         <span class="dbox-italic">n.</span> 
         <section class="def-pbk"> 
          <div class="def-set"> 
           <p>mid-14c., from Old French <span class="dbox-italic">difference</span> (12c.) "difference, distinction; argument, dispute," from Latin <span class="dbox-italic">differentia</span> "diversity, difference," from <span class="dbox-italic">differentem</span> (nominative <span class="dbox-italic">differens</span>), present participle of <span class="dbox-italic">differre</span> "to set apart" (see <a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/differ">differ</a>). Sense of "a quarrel" first attested late 14c. Colloquial phrase <span class="dbox-italic">what's the diff?</span> first recorded 1896.</p> 
          </div> 
         </section> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        Online Etymology Dictionary,  2010 Douglas Harper
       <br> 
       <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="difference" data-source="etymon2">Cite This Source</a> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section id="source-ahsmd" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-ahsmd is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-title"> 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> in Medicine 
       <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <p><b>difference</b> difference (d?f'?r-?ns, d?f'r?ns)<br><i>n.</i> <br> The magnitude or degree by which one quantity differs from another of the same kind.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary
       <br>Copyright  2002, 2001, 1995 by Houghton Mifflin Company. Published by Houghton Mifflin Company.
       <br> 
       <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="difference" data-source="ahsmd">Cite This Source</a> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section id="source-das" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-das is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-title">
        Slang definitions &amp; phrases for 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> 
       <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <div class="ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-con&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;def&quot;}"> 
        <h3>difference</h3> 
        <div class="def-con"> 
         <p class="def-class">Related Terms</p> 
         <p class="def-text"> <a href="/browse/same-difference--the">the same difference</a> </p> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        The Dictionary of American Slang, Fourth Edition by Barbara Ann Kipfer, PhD. and Robert L. Chapman, Ph.D.
       <br>Copyright (C) 2007 by HarperCollins Publishers.
       <br> 
       <a href="#" class="source-cite" rel="nofollow" data-term="difference" data-source="das">Cite This Source</a> 
      </div> 
     </section> 
     <section id="source-ahdi2" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" class="source-wrapper source-ahdi2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot"> 
      <div class="source-title">
        Idioms and Phrases with 
       <span class="u-headword">difference</span> 
       <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-box oneClick-area"> 
       <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big"> 
        <div class="header-row header-first-row"> 
         <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">difference</span></h2> 
        </div> 
       </header> 
       <div class="source-data ce-spot" data-collapse-expand="{&quot;target&quot;: &quot;.def-list&quot;, &quot;type&quot;: &quot;cols&quot;}"> 
        <div class="def-list def-list-single"> 
         <div class="def-set"> 
          <div class="def-content"> 
           <div class="def-ref-list"> 
            <span>see: </span> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/make-a-difference">make a difference</a></li> 
             <li><a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/split--the--difference">split the difference</a></li> 
            </ul> 
            <div class="u-clear"></div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-ref-list"> 
            <span>also see under: </span> 
           </div> 
           <div class="def-ref-list"> 
            <span><a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/different">different</a></span> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <div class="u-clear"></div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="source-meta">
        The American Heritage Idioms Dictionary
       <br>Copyright  2002, 2001, 1995 by Houghton Mifflin Company. Published by Houghton Mifflin Company.
       <br>

      <h3 class="title">Nearby words for difference</h3>

     <div class="right-rail-sticky-box"> 
      <div class="rightRailBottomAd"></div> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
    <div class="survey" data-imp="4b238x"> 
     <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/e/?src=dcom-serp-tab" class="link" target="_blank" data-linkid="4b238x">EVERYTHING AFTER Z</a> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
   <div class="row"> 
    <div id="dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90"> 
     <script type="text/javascript">
        if (typeof UserController !== "undefined" && !UserController.shouldDisplayAds()) {
            document.getElementById("dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90").parentNode.removeChild(document.getElementById(""));
        } else {
            adStatus.displayedSpots.push("dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90");
            googletag.cmd.push(function () {
                googletag.display("dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90");
            });
        }
    </script> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
  </div> 
  <footer class="footer-thin"> 
   <div class="footer-container" data-linkid="gy27eg"> 
    <div> 
     <ul class="footer-navbar"> 
      <li class="footer-navbar-list"> <a href="http://content.dictionary.com/">About</a> </li> 
      <li class="footer-navbar-list"> <a href="http://www.dictionary.com/terms">Terms &amp; Privacy</a> </li> 
     </ul> 
     <div class="footer-copyright">
       &nbsp;2017 Dictionary.com, LLC. 
     </div> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
  </footer> 
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://app.dictionary.com/js/advertisement.js"></script> 
  <script>
    if (typeof window.canRunAds === 'undefined') {
        var img = new Image(),
        url = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=a&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop';

        url = url.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))
            .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000))
            .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', (cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || ''));
        img.src = url;
    }
</script> 
  <script>
    /*
     Below immediately function provide support for browsers, which do not support modern standards (https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/)
     partially taken from: plainjs.com
    */
    (function (e) {
        'use strict';
        e.matches = e.matches ||
            e.matchesSelector ||
            e.webkitMatchesSelector ||
            e.msMatchesSelector ||
            function (selector) {
                var node = this, nodes = (node.parentNode || node.document).querySelectorAll(selector), i = -1;
                while (nodes[++i] && nodes[i] != node);
                return !!nodes[i];
            };
        e.closest = e.closest || function (css) {
                var node = this;
                while (node) {
                    if (node.matches(css)) return node;
                    else node = node.parentElement;
                }
                return null;
            };
        e.hasClass = e.hasClass || function (className) {
                var node = this;
                return node.classList ? node.classList.contains(className) : new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b').test(node.className);
            };
        e.addClass = e.addClass || function (className) {
                var node = this;
                if (node.classList) node.classList.add(className);
                else if (!node.hasClass(node, className)) node.className += ' ' + className;
            };
        e.removeClass = e.removeClass || function(className) {
                var node = this;
                if (node.classList) node.classList.remove(className);
                else node.className = node.className.replace(new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b', 'g'), '');
            };
        e.on = e.on || function (event, selector, callback, context) {
                var el = context || document;
                el.addEventListener(event, function (e) {
                    var found, el = e.target || e.srcElement;
                    while (el && el.matches && el !== context && !(found = el.matches(selector))) el = el.parentElement;
                    if (found) callback.call(this, el, e);
                });
            };
    }(Element.prototype));
</script>
  <!-- Begin Quantcast Tag, part 2 --> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
if (typeof UserController === "undefined" || !UserController.isUnder13()) {
    _qevents.push({qacct: "p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ"});
}
</script> 
  <noscript> 
   <div style="display: none;">
    <img src="//pixel.quantserve.com/pixel/p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ.gif" height="1" width="1" alt="Quantcast">
   </div> 
  </noscript> 
  <!-- End Quantcast Tag, part 2 -->
  <script>
    /*global $, pageName, window */

    var BCT = (function () {
        'use strict';

        var webTrackURL = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=c&cl=%40%40LINKIDS%40%40&ci=%40%40ITEM%40%40&co=%40%40ORDINAL%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&ds=%40%40DESTINATION%40%40&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop',
            query, originalQuery;

                    originalQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
            query =  originalQuery !== null ? originalQuery : "difference";

            webTrackURL = webTrackURL.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);
        
        /**
         * Returns data, which will be logged.
         *
         * NOTE:
         * Possible, that empty array will be returned.
         */
        function getData(target) {
            var ctsData,
                closestLinkIDElement,
                data = {};

            ctsData = JSON.parse(target.getAttribute('data-cts'));
            if (ctsData !== null) {
                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId;
                data.item = "";
                data.ordinal = ctsData.ordinal;
            } else {
                closestLinkIDElement = target.closest('[data-linkid]');
                if (null !== closestLinkIDElement && null === target.closest('[data-type]')) {
                    data.linkId = closestLinkIDElement.getAttribute('data-linkid');
                    data.item = getItem(target);
                    data.ordinal = getOrdinal(target, closestLinkIDElement);
                }
            }
            return data;
        }

        function getItem(target) {
            var closestWithItem = target.closest('[data-item]'),
                item = '';

            if (null !== closestWithItem) {
                item = target.textContent.trim();
            }

            return item;
        }

        function getOrdinal(target, dataItem) {
            var closestWithOrdinal,
                value = '';

            if (dataItem !== target) { // if element with linkid is not the anchor itself we are going deeper
                closestWithOrdinal = target.closest('[data-ordinal]');
                if (null !== closestWithOrdinal) {
                    var links = closestWithOrdinal.querySelectorAll("a"),
                        len = links.length;

                    for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                        if (target === links[i]) {
                            value = i + 1;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            return value;
        }

        /**
         * Returns data, which are generated always in the same way
         */
        function getCommonData(destination) {
            var data = {};
            data.cacheBuster = Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);
            data.pageName = pageName;
            data.mseg = getMsegValue();
            data.destination = encodeURIComponent(destination);
            return data;
        }

        /**
         * Redirects user to destination
         */
        function redirectToDest(location) {
            window.location = location;
        }

        /**
         * Returns value of cookie based on name
         */
        function getCookieByName(name) {
            var value = null,
                cookies = document.cookie,
                searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");

            // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie
            if (searchedCookie === -1) {
                var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");
                searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie === 0 ? 0 : -1;
            }

            if (searchedCookie > -1) {
                var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,
                    endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);

                if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {
                    endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;
                }

                value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);
            }

            return value;
        }

        /**
         * Returns value of mseg cookie
         */
        function getMsegValue() {
            var msegVal;
            if (typeof cookiesManager !== "undefined") {
                msegVal = cookiesManager.getCookieValue("mseg");
            } else {
                msegVal = getCookieByName("mseg");
            }

            return msegVal || "";
        }

        /**
         * Renders WebTrack URL
         */
        function renderWebTrackURL(data, destination) {
            var commonData = getCommonData(destination);
            return webTrackURL.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))
                .replace('%40%40LINKIDS%40%40', data.linkId || "")
                .replace('%40%40ITEM%40%40', encodeURIComponent(data.item) || "")
                .replace('%40%40ORDINAL%40%40', data.ordinal || "")
                .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', commonData.cacheBuster || "")
                .replace('%40%40PAGENAME%40%40', commonData.pageName || "")
                .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', commonData.mseg || "")
                .replace('%40%40DESTINATION%40%40', commonData.destination || "");
        }

        function logAndRedirect(data, destination) {
            var logURL = renderWebTrackURL(data, destination),
                image = new Image(),
                timeout;

            timeout = setTimeout(
                function(){
                    redirectToDest(destination);
                },
                2000
            );

            image.onload = image.onerror = function () {
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                redirectToDest(destination);
            };

            image.src = logURL;

            return false;
        }

        /**
         * Registers click event handler to body so it receives every click on anchor.
         */
        function attachHandler() {
            var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];

            bodyTag.on("click", 'a', function (elem, event) {
                var target = event.target,
                    enabled = target.closest('.cts-enabled'),
                    disabled = target.closest('.cts-disabled'),
                    destination = elem.getAttribute('href'),
                    dataToLog;

                if (typeof destination === "undefined") {
                    return true;
                }

                if (target.hasClass('cts-clicked')) {
                    return false;
                }

                //ACE-1060
                if (disabled !== null && (enabled === null || disabled.childNodes.length < enabled.childNodes.length)) { return true }

                dataToLog = getData(target);

                // if object has no id it means that link shouldn't be tracked - follow the link
                if (typeof dataToLog.linkId === "undefined") {
                    return true;
                }
                event.preventDefault();

                // mark this link as already clicked
                target.addClass('cts-clicked');

                return logAndRedirect(dataToLog, destination);
            });
        }

        return {
            attachHandler: attachHandler,
            /**
             * ::redirect() method is method used by oneClick module
             */
            redirect: function (ctsData, destinationHref, item) {
                var data = {};
                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId || ctsData.linkid;
                data.item = item;
                data.ordinal = '';
                return logAndRedirect(data, destinationHref);
            }
        };
    }());

    /** Do the initial attachment to <body> links */
    BCT.attachHandler();

</script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.sfdict.com/app/js/require-37278.js"></script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    requirejs.config({
            waitSeconds: 60,
            baseUrl: "http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/js",
            paths: {"appcore":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js","options":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js\/options-b826f","facebook":"http:\/\/connect.facebook.net\/en_US\/all","twitter":"https:\/\/platform.twitter.com\/widgets","instagram":"https:\/\/x.instagramfollowbutton.com\/follow","google-plus":"https:\/\/apis.google.com\/js\/platform","jquery":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js\/jquery-1.11.3.min-4069b","page\/serp\/main":"page\/serp\/main-abe43"},
            shim: {"facebook":{"exports":"FB"},"twitter":{"exports":"twttr"},"instagram":[],"google-plus":{"exports":"googleplus"}}        });
        define("runtime-options", function() {
        return {"definitionsLimit":5,"definitionsDisplayed":3,"wotdLink":"<a href=\"http:\/\/www.dictionary.com\/wordoftheday\/\"  class=\"word\"  id=\"wotd\" data-linkid=\"rpilnc\" >$$word$$<\/a>","flashAudioPlayerPath":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/flash\/player-d6fab.swf","isFavoriteURL":"http:\/\/app.dictionary.com\/favorites\/api\/getfavorites","addFavoriteURL":"http:\/\/app.dictionary.com\/favorites\/api\/addword","searchTerm":"difference","loginPageURL":"http:\/\/app.dictionary.com\/login\/core","clientPlatform":"Desktop","interstitialDashRenderApi":"http:\/\/app.dictionary.com\/api\/dash\/render\/ipadInterstitial\/dict_serp_ipadInterstitial","canonicalURL":"http:\/\/www.dictionary.com\/browse\/difference","pageName":"","wotdApiUrl":"http:\/\/restapi.dictionary.com\/api\/wordoftheday","pageType":"serp","variant":false,"citeThisSourceAPIURL":"http:\/\/app.dictionary.com\/api\/citethissource.json?app=dictionary","collapseExpandSettings":{"luna":{"container":"#source-luna","types":{"def":{"name":"luna definitions","type":0,"desktop":{"visibleEntries":7,"condition":7},"mobile":{"visibleEntries":2,"condition":2}},"supEntry":{"name":"supplementary notes - entry-based elements","type":0,"desktop":{"visibleEntries":5,"condition":5},"mobile":{"visibleEntries":2,"condition":2}},"supText":{"name":"supplementary notes - textual elements","type":1,"desktop":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":5},"mobile":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":5}},"usgAlert":{"name":"usage alert - textual elements","type":1,"desktop":{"visibleLines":3,"condition":3},"mobile":{"visibleLines":3,"condition":3}}},"specCase":{"name":"special collapse expand for Luna Mobile","type":0,"mobile":{"visibleEntries":4,"condition":5}}},"idioms":{"container":"#source-ahdi2","types":{"cols":{"name":"idioms dictionary 2 cols list and text","type":3,"desktop":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":7}},"list":{"name":"idioms dictionary ordered list","type":4,"desktop":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":7}}}},"slang":{"container":"#source-das","types":{"def":{"name":"slang dictionary text based","type":5,"desktop":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":7}}}},"21century":{"container":"#source-dict21db","types":{"cent21_entry":{"name":"21st Century entry text","type":6,"desktop":{"visibleLines":5,"condition":7}}}},"collins":{"container":"#source-ced2","types":{"collins":{"name":"collins definitions","type":2,"desktop":{"entries":{"visibleEntries":3,"condition":5},"lines":{"visibleLines":10,"condition":12}}}}},"sentences":{"container":"#source-example-sentences","types":{"sentences_list":{"name":"example sentences list","type":8,"desktop":{"visibleList":3,"condition":4},"mobile":{"visibleList":10,"condition":11}}}}},"collapseExpandToggles":{"luna_entry":0,"luna_text":1,"idioms_cols":3,"idioms_list":4,"slang_text":5,"cent21_entry":6,"col_number":2,"sentences_list":8},"CTSParams":{"infix":"","clkpage":"dic","clksite":"dict","clkld":0},"webTrack":{"clickInner":"http:\/\/track.dictionary.com\/main.gif?ev=n&tg=%40%40TARGET%40%40&ar=%40%40ADREFRESH%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop","impressions":"http:\/\/track.dictionary.com\/main.gif?ev=i&lk=%40%40IMPRESSIONLINKIDS%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop","pageview":"http:\/\/track.dictionary.com\/main.gif?ev=p&ct=%40%40CONTENTTITLE%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop","click":"http:\/\/track.dictionary.com\/main.gif?ev=c&cl=%40%40LINKIDS%40%40&ci=%40%40ITEM%40%40&co=%40%40ORDINAL%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&ds=%40%40DESTINATION%40%40&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop"},"socialEvent":"{\"basePath\":\"http:\\\/\\\/track.dictionary.com\\\/track\\\/social\",\"attributes\":{\"site\":\"dict\",\"pageName\":\"dic\",\"ldid\":0}}"};
    });
    require(["page\/serp\/main"])
</script> 
  <script>
    (function (factory) {
        if (typeof require === 'function') {
            require(['jquery'], factory);
        } else {
            factory($);
        }
    }(function($) {
        var impressionLinkIds = {};
        $('[data-imp]').each(function () {
            if ($(this).is(':visible')) {
                var imp = $(this).data('imp').toString().split('|', 2);
                if (impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] === undefined) {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] = 0;
                }
                if (imp[1] !== undefined) {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += parseInt(imp[1]);
                } else {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += 1;
                }
            }
        });

        var lkValue = '';
        for (var linkId in impressionLinkIds) {
            lkValue += linkId + (impressionLinkIds[linkId] > 1 ? '|' + impressionLinkIds[linkId] : '') + ','
        }
        if (lkValue.slice(-1) === ',') {
            lkValue = lkValue.slice(0, -1);
        }
        if (lkValue != '') {
            var ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms;
            new Image().src = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=i&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop&lk=" + lkValue + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random()*899999999)+100000000);
        }
    }));
</script>   
 </body>
</html>
